author: Patrick Hosken
title: How Adam Schlesinger Briefly Appeared On The Real World‘s First Episode
description: Adam Schlesinger, who died this week, appeared on the very first episode of MTV's 'The Real World' rehearsing a song with cast member Rebecca Blasband. She tells MTV News about their relationship in the early '90s and what she'll miss the most.
content: Adam Schlesinger's music belonged on television. One of the Fountains of Wayne songwriter's most visible composition was 2003's "Stacy's Mom," thanks to its Rachel Hunter-in-a-bikini-led video that dominated MTV. The clip preceded a slew of other Schlesinger-… [+5573 chars]
